name: 101 Penguin Pets
summary: Aqua pets are waiting for you to adopt and love them! 101 Penguin Pets is a simulation of raising a penguin which can be chosen from 101 possibilities. Raise one or 101, it's your choice! The rules are simple. You need to take care of your penguin(s) and keep its statistics as high as possible. To achieve this, you have to feed it, take care of its' health and mood, develop its' personality, play games with it and train it. Sometimes your penguin may fall ill and will need to visit the vet, so you should pay careful attention to its condition.
